item.title: Food eaten by the !kun
item.summary: The names and descriptions of some plants and animals eaten in !nanni and Tamme's country. It includes notes on whether the food is eaten raw or cooked, and what food is found in the Damara's country.
item.comments: 1) See also What !nanni's father told him (what to eat and avoid) and Elephants (eating their hearts) and Things eaten by the !kun and Animals eaten by the !kun, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4
item.author: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
